title: PvP net kernel not responding.
body:
I wanna press R on people with Veigar. Let me in. 

In all seriousness though my PVP net kernel will not respond when I go to open the launcher. I have changed nothing about my PC lately and was playing perfectly fine at 12am today.

replies.body: That happens to me also but all i do it right click the client and click run as administrator, it works for me but I have to do it every time i open the client, but it's not a big hassle.

It sounds like an event horizon has been wrapped around your game files, so the patcher can't get into it.  You'll want to craft a banshee's veil to get through by following the steps in this [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Too much?  

That should get you squared away but hit me up if you have any issues!

I am the admin account and only account on my pc, however it seems like deleting all files and re-installing completely has worked. I play a game called Elsword, which has gameguard security and recently I've tried to launch league while playing Elsword with no avail. That may have altered the PVP.net patcher kernel unknowingly. No errors came up when trying to play both at once League just didn't open. Just to help ya out with what may cause problems with the Kernel. I have successfully launched the launcher now. 

~Thank you for the help, love, Jacob. {{champion:103}}
